projects.title: Portfolio AI
projects.description: AI-assisted portfolio showcasing modern development practices with dynamic themes, automated CI/CD, and interactive technical deep-dives built with Cursor AI and Next.js.
projects.longDescription: A sophisticated portfolio website that demonstrates the power of AI-assisted development, built entirely with Cursor AI and Next.js. Features dynamic sakura/ocean themes with mono no aware aesthetics, comprehensive CI/CD automation, and interactive technical deep-dives. Showcases advanced engineering practices including automated PR management, scheduled deployments, data validation with Zod, and performance optimization. The project serves as both a portfolio and a case study of modern AI-human collaboration in software development.
achievements: AI-assisted development from concept to deployment
Custom sakura petal animations with sakura.js
Responsive design with Mantine UI components
Comprehensive data validation with Zod schemas
Advanced scroll indicator with keyboard navigation
Resume data extraction and structured display
Advanced CI/CD pipeline with scheduled deployments
Automated PR management and branch protection
Technical deep-dive modals with behind-the-scenes details
Comprehensive error handling and conflict resolution

projects.title: Audio Key BPM Analyzer AI
projects.description: KIRO/AI generated music tool that helps new (or not so new!) music producers by analyzing the key and BPM of an instrumental file. Useful for autotune applications.
projects.longDescription: This tool is comparable in output to Tunebat.com's key and bpm analyzer. The waveform display was inspired by Soundcloud and the algorithm behind the analysis uses essentia.js. It's main use case is for analyzing instrumental music files as a music producer with a lack of music theory knowledge.
achievements: AI-assisted development taking concept to deployment
Responsive design with Chakra UI components
Audio key and BPM analysis with essentia.js

analytics.description: Tracks user engagement and audio processing metrics including files processed.

monitoring.description: Monitors audio processing errors and system health for reliable analysis.

cicd.description: Automated pipeline that tests, builds, and deploys with continuous integration.

architecture.description: Built with Vite, Chakra UI, Essentia.js for audio analysis, and Web Audio API.
